thread.title: BRIEF-Chuying Agro-Pastoral To Set Up Grain Subsidiary, To Boost Unit's Capital With External Investors

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chuying Agro-Pastoral To Set Up Grain Subsidiary, To Boost Unit's Capital With External Investors

organizations.name: reuters) - chuying agro-pastoral group co ltd

text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Chuying Agro-Pastoral Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT AND EXTERNAL INVESTORS PLAN TO BOOST UNITâ€™S CAPITAL TO 3.0 BILLION YUAN ($473.91 million) FROM 860 MILLION YUAN
* SAYS IT PLANS TO SET UP GRAIN SUBSIDIARY WITH REGISTERED CAPITAL OF UP TO 300 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FuHMAm ; bit.ly/2tyEMkG Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3303 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
